t:
I stepped into the time machine in my 13th story apartment to go back to 1987.


But even with all my calculations I forgot that my building was not built back then.
c:
As I plummeted to my death, with time stretching out as my life flashed before my eyes, I realised how insignificant time was.



Explanation: The building wasn't built in 1987. So when I reached that time, I was mid-air instead of the 13th floor of my building and fell down to death.





#time #timetravel #scifi #mistake #calculation #fall #death #helpless
